product_name: BriogeoBe Gentle, Be Kind Aloe + Oat Milk Ultra Soothing 3-in-1 Cleansing Bar
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackBriogeo Be Gentle, Be Kind Aloe + Oat Milk Ultra Soothing 3-in-1 Cleansing Bar is a 3-in-1 hypoallergenic, fragrance-free, dermatologist-tested and pH-friendly cleansing bar to soothe and nourish your hair, face, and body.
details: DetailsBenefitsFormulated with 2% Colloidal Oatmeal, Aloe Vera, and Green Tea Extract to soothe skin and scalp sensitivities.Gently lifts away dirt and excess oil.Calms, nourishes, and moisturizes for softer and healthy-looking hair and skin.Clean, naturally derived, and made with Briogeo's proprietary NOVA Complex that gently nourishes and soothes your skin and scalp.Key Ingredients2% Colloidal Oatmeal: Naturally calms scalp irritation + inflammationAloe Vera: Loaded with soothing vitamins + mineralsGreen Tea Extract: Delivers antioxidant protection + anti-microbial benefitsResearch ResultsHypoallergenicItem 2601787How To UseWet bar and build lather by rubbing between hands, or massage bar directly onto your hair, face, and body.Rinse thoroughly.Store away from flowing water and allow bar to dry thoroughly between uses.For added benefits, pair with aloe + oat milk ultra soothing conditioner and aloe + oat milk ultra soothing detangling spray.IngredientsSodium Cocoyl Isethionate*, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil*, Polyglyceryl-4 Laurate*, Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin*, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour*, Distarch Phosphate*, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter*, Avena Sativa (Oat) Bran*, Panthenol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract*, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract*, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil*, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate*, Maltodextrin*, Quercetin*, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Wet bar and build lather by rubbing between hands, or massage bar directly onto your hair, face, and body.Rinse thoroughly.Store away from flowing water and allow bar to dry thoroughly between uses.For added benefits, pair with aloe + oat milk ultra soothing conditioner and aloe + oat milk ultra soothing detangling spray.

reviews.headline: Good
reviews.comments: This is a good shampoo bar. It has a lovely fragrance. Applies to my hair easily, cleanses and lathers well. It also is gentle on my scalp and skin.  Unfortunately it's still rather drying for my hair.

reviews.headline: Wonderful Soap!
reviews.comments: I use the soap to cleanse my body NOT for my hair. As someone who suffers from occasional bouts of eczema this is a good soap with oatmeal to help with my sensitive skin

reviews.headline: That's a NO for me
reviews.comments: I was so excited about a 3 in 1 cleansing barâ€¦.then I used it. It lathers like a shampoo. I thougjt it would be more like a cleansing conditioner. It is not. It left my hair feeling like i didnt get all the hairspray out of my hair, and i dont use a lot of hairspray. I wont be using it again.

reviews.headline: Love this product!
reviews.comments: This is my first time trying a shampoo bar and this product does not disappoint! My hair is fine and wavy. It does not leave it oily at all. I will definitely continue to use and hope they continue to make this keeper!

reviews.headline: My favorite!!
reviews.comments: I love this shampoo bar!!! it makes my hair soft and great for skin too. I hope they don't stop making this. I plan to continue to use this.

reviews.headline: Itchy Flaky
reviews.comments: I wanted this to work, because theoretically it's more convenient. It lathered fine, but gave me an itchy, flaky scalp, which is very unusual for me. Had to return it.

reviews.headline: Good For Sensitive Skim
reviews.comments: I use it as a bath soap only and it's wonderful for my sensitive skin. I have eczema and it helps to soothe my skin and eventually disappear.

reviews.headline: Loved it
reviews.comments: First time trying a bar as my shampoo and i was impressed. Most bar soaps are usually super drying but this one was gentle enough to clean and not over dry the hair. It barely has a smell, it very gently. Overall I love the product

reviews.headline: Sensitive skin, sustainable shopping girlies rejoice!
reviews.comments: I looooooooove this product. I've been using another popular brand of shampoo bars and body soaps, which are great, but this is just better. It lathers better. I use it on my face, body and scalp. Out of everything I've tried, this is absolutely the best. It IS about 10 dollars more than what I usually buy but it's worth it.

reviews.headline: Couldn't stop thinking about it
reviews.comments:
I was diagnosed with RA and temporarily couldnt use my upper limbs (arms, wrist and fingers) very well so i began slacking in the lotion after showering department. 
I first bought this bar to help hydrate to get me by and yeah i noticed a difference. Fast forward 4 months later (now) after returning to different body washes, i just bought another one because i couldnt stop thinking about the bar since i last bought it. Only wish it was cheaper or i could buy it in bulk, cheaper would be nicer.

reviews.headline: Great bar shampoo!
reviews.comments:
After I bleached my hair, almost every shampoo would leave my hair feeling like straw. Bar shampoos in particular were rough on my hair which was disappointing since I was trying to be more eco-conscious. This shampoo on the other hand makes my hair feel so soft! I love that it is gentle on my scalp and, it doesn't seem to have any artificial scents. It lathers well and also doesn't feel stripping on the skin.

The only supposed con is the plastic wrapper in an otherwise great eco-conscious product. I've used other bars that have fully compostable packaging, so it was a little disappointing but not a dealbreaker.
If this isn't a con for you, I would say there really is nothing negative I can say about this shampoo.

reviews.headline: Better than high end shampoos
reviews.comments:
I have lost track of how many expensive shampoos I have tried but never repurchased. This one leaves my hair cleaner and softer for longer without stripping. For reference I have thinning hair (thanks perimenopause) with oily roots and dry ends. As a bonus it doesn't come
in single use plastic bottles. Please continue carrying this product!

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: I love how my hair looks and feels.

reviews.headline: Obsessed
reviews.comments: I am mind blown by this product! It was the first time for me to use a shampoo bar. I did feel it was crazy sudsy and could've had less suds for the desired effect. I usually use Bumble and Bumble for my hair.  After using this product, I plan to continue purchasing it as my main shampoo. I love that it's unscented. I like the ingredients.

reviews.headline: For troubled scalps
reviews.comments: I bought this because it has no fragrance, contains oat and aloe, and comes as a sustainable substitute for plastic bottles! My scalp had become so sensitive and tender from using a purple shampoo and conditioner and while hot water on my scalp for everytime I washed my hair (2-3 times/week). I tried just putting the water on cool but that didn't cut it. I tried this with cool water and my scalp made a whole turn around. It feels healthy and normal again, I am so happy.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I love this bar so much! I love that it's eco-friendly and it has many different uses. I'm picky about what I put in my hair. However, I saw great results after using this product. I like to use this on my face because I have sensitive skin

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I love this product for my face and body only! I love that it is clean and simple. There is comfort in knowing simple ingredients were used and I do feel very clean after using!

reviews.headline: Very convenient !
reviews.comments: It can be a little stripping for the hair but overall seems to fair better than most other soap bars out there and it does a good job of cleaning

reviews.headline: This is forever a staple in my routine!
reviews.comments: I use this bar absolutely everyday! It's good for everything and way better than slathering chemicals on your body, hair, and face everyday. I love everything about this from its sustainability, the cleanest of ingredients, and the way it makes my skin feel!

reviews.headline: Excellent!
reviews.comments: This product surprised me! I love the way it lathers, and my hair feels so soft and no need for conditioner. I have very fine hair and conditioner weighs it down, so I am so happy this works.

media.headline: Soothing and gentle
media.caption: Soothing and gentle for Hair, Body and Face

faceoff_positive.comments: I initially bought this to use when I take quick trips to the gym between classes since it's one product you can use for your whole body and it's efficient, which is what I expected it to be and not much more. I tested it at home and figured it would work fine for face and body but didn't expect a great hair day from it, but boy was I wrong. I double "shampoo'd" as per usual and I'm very impressed by how soft yet not weighed down my hair is, it also is much easier to detangle than normal. I have thick/dense yet dry hair so normally it's hard to get something that is moisturizing but still thoroughly cleans my hair and I am still in shock at how well this did. My skin is very happy with it too, again got a good clean but not stripping. I find myself reaching for it even at home over anything else. It did live up to my expectation of being efficient, but also far exceeded it. It's a new staple for me.
faceoff_positive.headline: Insanely good

faceoff_negative.comments: I have thick, oily hair and skin sensitivities.  I purchased this hoping to primarily use it as a shampoo.  I've been using it for a week and will have to discontinue using it.  After shampooing, my scalp doesn't feel clean, and my hair turns into an oily mess within 24 hours of washing my hair.  In comparison, when I use Briogeo's Cherry Mango Shampoo, I am able to go 2-3 days without my hair getting oily.  This bar just isn't meant for oily hair.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not for Oily Hair
